title: CPI >0.2% in Feb 2026
my_reasoning: CPI has been running 0.2-0.3% MoM consistently. Shelter and services inflation still sticky. 60% >0.2% is fair.

title: CPI >0.3% in Feb 2026
my_reasoning: Possible if energy/food spike. 25% reasonable given recent 0.3% prints. Cheap bet with 4:1 upside.

title: Fed rate >3.50% after March
my_reasoning: Fed at 4.25-4.50%. No way they cut 100bp in one meeting. 98%+ is correct. Market at 91-94% is slightly cheap but not enough edge after fees.
position: none - too expensive for remaining balance

title: Next Pope: Pietro Parolin
my_reasoning: Parolin is Vatican Secretary of State, seen as frontrunner by many. 8-9c feels slightly cheap. But Pope selection is unpredictable.
